name: No Time For Psychos
description:
You have been chosen to work as a psychiatrist for your country, Bunglev.

You will analyze your patients using the Rorschach test and tell if they suffer any mental issue.

Will you honor your country or will you be guided by your ethics?

CONTROLS:

  • Left Control to start and end day.
  • Space to let the patient enter the office.
  • Escape to leave computer.
  • Drag and drop the inkblots on the patient to start a conversation.
  • Office room by Elcanetay:   https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/office-room-furniture-7...
  • Patients made with UMA 2:   https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/uma-2-unity-multipurpose-ava...
  • Menu music by Yann: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/silent-mist-102491
  • Anonymous icon by Stephen Plaster: https://thenounproject.com/term/anonymous/638448/
  • Chat icon by Pixel Perfect: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/chat_589708
  • Grab icon by Kiranshastry: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/grab_1612617
  • Open hand icon by Pixel perfect: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/open-hands_3179232
  • Error sound by Austistic Lucario:   https://freesound.org/people/Autistic%20Lucario/sounds/142608/
